post.title: fs lnib 10/10 unlocked palm pre plus work on rogers/bell/fido/telus
post.content: i have a 10/10 lnib unlocked palm pre plus. comes with everything and the box. pics avaiable apon request. price is $450. gta only. local pick up only. need to sell asap. thanks in advance. ps. they wouldn't give me the touchstone charger, because i never bought it on contract.
